abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Additional Financing for the Second Decentralized City
            Management Project is to increase access to infrastructure
            and basic services for residents of Benin's primary
            cities (Cotonou, Porto-Novo and Parakou) and selected
            secondary cities (Abomey-Calavi, Lokossa and Kandi) . This
            reallocation is necessary to enable the Government of Benin
            not only to smoothly complete on-going works on different
            sites and also to start the pavement and drainage works on
            two new roads in Cotonou, particularly the road to
            Abomey-Calavi which was previously under the original credit
            but was put on hold due to insufficient fund.
